byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: The activist investor Nelson Peltz is calling on State Street to cut costs and consider shedding its investment management unit to help bolster its lagging stock price.
snippet: The activist investor Nelson Peltz is calling on State Street to cut costs and consider shedding its investment management unit to help bolster its lagging stock price.

headline.main: Peltz Pushes for Changes at State Street
